summary: Provides mock implementations of AWS Spot Fleet and Spot Instance request resources for the EC2 service, defining data structures for launch specifications and request objects, and a backend that supports creating, describing, modifying, cancelling, and filtering spot requests within the Moto testing framework.
business_intent: Enable developers to simulate and test Spot Fleet and Spot Instance workflows without accessing real AWS resources, facilitating automated testing and infrastructure-as-code validation.
